summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Lake Washington District of North Trunk Sewer District beginning on a south on the westerly shore line of Union Bay, and following in a general southerly direction to a south 120 feet south of Yesler Way produced et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing a trunk sewer to under Ordinance No. 16615, creating Local Improvement District No. 1534 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
